manifest.name: vue-eslint-parser
manifest.description: The ESLint custom parser for `.vue` files.

scripts.build: tsc --module es2015 && rollup -c -o index.js && dts-bundle --name vue-eslint-parser --main .temp/index.d.ts --out ../index.d.ts
scripts.setup: git submodule update --init && cd test/fixtures/eslint && npm install
scripts.watch:test: wait-on index.js && warun index.js "test/*.js" "test/fixtures/ast/*/*.json" "test/fixtures/*" --debounce 1000 --no-initial -- nyc mocha "test/*.js" --reporter dot --timeout 10000
scripts.watch:update-ast: wait-on index.js && warun index.js "test/fixtures/ast/*/*.vue" -- node scripts/update-fixtures-ast.js
